content:
The linter is complaining that some things defined as def should be lemmas.
But things like has_limits are typeclasses. What should I do here? @Johan Commelin @Bhavik Mehta @Markus Himmel
They're typeclasses, but they're propositional, so you should mark them as lemmas (I think)
Is it safe to push a commit after bors has entered the picture?
Sure. The merge will be canceled and a maintainer will have to reapprove the PR
